Category: Top‑level grouping (Customer & Support, Marketing & Sales, Business Systems, Industry Solutions, Growth Systems).
Description: Short value proposition and scope of the service.
Target Audiences: Primary buyer/user segments this service targets.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps: Exact step‑by‑step instructions to configure the service inside SuiteDash.
Integrations/Tools: External tools/platforms used and how they connect (BOS bundle).

Description: No‑code trigger→action rules to eliminate repetitive tasks and handoffs.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Document process; define triggers, actions, delays.
2. Implement automations (e.g., invoice paid → status change).
3. Create task templates & checklists; assign owners.
4. Use Flows for guided, multi‑step procedures.
5. Log automation outcomes; refine exceptions.

Description: Courses, lessons, and quizzes for staff/clients with auto‑enrollment.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Enable LMS; create Courses/Modules/Lessons.
2. Upload media; add quizzes/certificates.
3. Auto‑enroll via triggers (new staff, deal won, purchase).
4. Set reminders and completion actions.
5. Track progress; report by team/franchise.

Description: KPIs and trend widgets fed from invoices and external systems.
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Define metrics (MRR, AR, on‑time delivery).
2. Wire data sources (SuiteDash, QBO, Sheets).
3. Build dashboard widgets & charts in portal.
4. Schedule nightly data refresh via Make.
5. Set threshold alerts (overdue, targets met).
Integrations/Tools: SuiteDash Invoices/Dashboards, QuickBooks/Xero, Google Sheets, Make/AITable

Description: APIs + automation to sync SuiteDash with accounting, email, POS, etc.
Target Audiences: IT Service Providers, Ops/IT, Multi‑tool orgs
SuiteDash Workflow Steps:
1. Inventory apps; define data flows & field mapping.
2. Create Make/n8n workflows; secure credentials.
3. Configure SuiteDash webhooks/API triggers.
4. Test end‑to‑end with seed records; add retries.
5. Document runs; set error notifications.
